message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $110 is too high, but I can meet you at $108.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $108. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
